items.name: Rainbowstride
enchantMods: 10% increased Movement Speed if you haven't been Hit Recently
explicitMods: 18% Chance to Block Spell Damage
+42 to maximum Mana
+20% to all Elemental Resistances
20% increased Movement Speed
flavourText: "They say that you should take life's troubles in your stride.
Some men have a longer stride than others."
- Gaius Sentari

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies. If enemies are left below 10% of maximum life after being hit by these skills, they will be killed.
explicitMods: Kill Enemies that have 10% Life or lower when Hit by Supported Skills
Supported Skills deal 48% increased Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Activates every 1 second while Attached
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
10% increased Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% reduced Chaining range
Projectiles from Supported Skills have 4.8 metres maximum range
Supported Skills have 40% less Area of Effect

Supported Skills are Triggered by Arcanist Brand, from the Brand's location
hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a stationary electrical orb that strikes enemies in its area of effect with beams of lightning that can then split to hit more enemies. Modifiers to cast speed will increase how frequently it does this. Casting this skill again will replace the previous orb.
explicitMods: Deals 304 to 913 Lightning Damage
20% increased Lightning Damage
Strikes every 2.55 seconds, and when you use a Lightning Skill near the Orb
Strikes every 0.50 seconds while Channelling a Lightning Skill near the Orb
Orb disappears after 29 Strikes
Beams Split towards 3 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed enemy will grant life and mana, and a power charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have a 100% chance to grant a Power Charge when slain
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +1.5% to Critical Strike Chance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +49% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Cursed enemies grant 600 Life when Killed
Cursed enemies grant 80 Mana when Killed
Cursed Enemies have a 5% chance to grant a Power Charge when Hit
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

- Chieftainess Ahuana of the Ramako Tribe
